r.s: a PHP extension that provides word stemming
r.d: This stem extension for PHP provides stemming capability for a variety of languages using Dr. M.F. Porter's Snowball API, which can be found at: http://snowball.tartarus.org
r.n: * Reimported the new API from Snowball and synchronize all currently available stemmers. * Added Turkish (Unicode), Romanian and Hungarian stemmers * Using current param parsing in ZE (don't manipulate zvals directly) * Fix bug #12482
